com.gwtsystem.server.service

Class CustomerTypeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwtsystem.server.service.CustomerTypeService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICustomerTypeService

    @Service(value="customerTypeService")
@Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
public class CustomerTypeService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICustomerTypeService
    Service class, for do operations with CustomerType entity on Service layer In this class entity convert to DTO object Created by alexanderleonovich on 29.07.15.
